= Details =

Some texts which give a good theoretical background for the use and implementation of an electronic Laser Locking Circuit.

 * [http://primus-hiwi.googlecode.com/files/laser-lock.pdf Stabilizing a diode laser to an external reference] - See Chapter 4, Laser Locking Circuit
 * [http://primus-hiwi.googlecode.com/files/laserlock2.pdf A CO2 Laser Lattice Experiment for Cold Atoms] - See Chapter 5.3, Laser Stabilization
